QuestData.Title: Down the Goren Hole
QuestData.Description: These beasts came at us so fast we didn't have time to mount a proper defense. They went right for the metal and chewed through any wall we had.$b$bIf we don't kill some of them soon they'll bring the whole fortress down on us.
QuestData.CompletionText: All in a day's work, eh Commander?
QuestData.RewardText: You give me blackrock orcs, troggs, er evil leper gnomes an' we'd be fine. But these acid munchin' beasts are the end of us.
